  • 构造器详细资料

    • DatabaseUtils

      public DatabaseUtils​(java.lang.String port)
      Constructor of DatabaseUtils class. In the constructor method, function generate the derbyDB link string delete "deliveries" and "flightpath" table in the database and create new one
      参数:
      port - the communication derbyDB port to the server

  • 方法详细资料

    • writeDeliver

      public void writeDeliver​(java.lang.String orderNumber, java.lang.String deliveryTo, int costInPence)
      Writ the input information into "deliveries" table.
      参数:
      orderNumber - the order number
      deliveryTo - the order destination
      costInPence - the price include delivery fee

    • writePath

      public void writePath​(java.lang.String orderNumber, double startLong, double startLat, int angle, double endLong, double endLat)
      Writ the input information into "flightpath" table.
      参数:
      orderNumber - the order number
      startLong - the starting point longitude
      startLat - the starting point latitude
      angle - the angle of the flight path (multiples of 10)
      endLong - the ending point longitude
      endLat - the ending point latitude

    • orderSearch

      public java.util.List<OrderDetail> orderSearch​(java.lang.String date)
      Method to search the order detail information by the input date
      参数:
      date - the date to be search
      返回:
      order detail information in type of the list of OrderDetail

    • orderDetailSearch

      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> orderDetailSearch​(java.lang.String orderNumber)
      Method to search the order detail information by the input order number
      参数:
      orderNumber - the order number to be search
      返回:
      order detail information in type of list of OrderDetail
